112.content:
Kairi awoke tied to a chair in the center of a circular room. A mirror stood in front of her, and as she struggled against her bindings, a tube descended from the ceiling.

"Wha-" Kairi managed to gasp out before the tube forced itself into her mouth. A thick, pudding-like liquid flowed through the tube and went down Kairi's throat. Almost immediatley, Kairi felt the ropes beginning to press against her. After a few seconds, Kairi realized that she was gaining weight- and fast. She felt a sharp pain around her waist.
112.title: Forced Feeding

choices: Phew! She was back to normal!
She was feeling as hungry as if she'd never eaten in her life!
She was still totally fat, but wearing a larger uniform!
1121.content:
Looking up, Kairi was shocked. She'd been force-fed the liquid for only 30 seconds but she was already gaining fast. Her chins were multiplying, and she couldn't see her chin anymore. Her belly was expanding, and her boobs were growing faster. Her arms were becoming as thick as tree trunks, and her thunder thighs were rapidly expanding.


The ropes snapped and Kairi's fat broke the chair. Her school uniform was beginning to rip, and eventually the shirt and skirt burst off, leaving Kairi on the floor in the bra and panties.


There was a hideous sucking noise as the hose ran out of liquid. Kairi pulled it from her mouth and, with difficulty, pulled herself to her feel off of her couch-sized ass. She wandered around, looking for an exit...

And then Kairi awoke in her bed!

Shoveling everything into her mouth that she could find, Kairi moaned in happiness, not noticing that she was gaining- and fast. After cleaning out one cabinet, she's gotten a bit fatter already.

It looked as if Kairi had stuffed beach balls into her pants where her ass should have been; it was at least 6 times bigger than it usually was. Having grown a now incountable number of cupsizes, Kairi's chest was beginning to obscure her face and lap over her belly, which each was bigger than.

Kairi finally realized what had happened and managed to heave her fat ass into a standing position. After calling Selphie to borrow some of her fatty sister's clothes (she was bigger than Kairi!) Kairi begins to...

113.content:
“Why does this always happen to me? Let go, you Heartless! Or I’ll smack you harder then I would normally!”

Kairi had been thrust into a lot of strange situations ever since she was 14. First the destruction of her homeworld by Heartless, then losing her heart and having it fused into a Keyblade wielded by her friend, Riku who had gone crazy under the guidance of the heart of an insane old man, then having the former two undone by one of her best friends, Sora, now wielding a powerful Keyblade, but forgetting said best friend in the process, then a year later being kidnapped by what was basically the shell of a wilful red haired young man operating under the command of the youthful body of an insane old man, being rescued by both Riku and Sora, then learning she could also wield a Keyblade and being given a crash course along with the fully revived young man-Lea, that was his name-on how to properly use the darned thing by a wizard and then having to fight off that Organization 13, dying in the process and having to be revived by Sora and then watching him finally finish of the insane old man that started it all, Xenahort.

With all that, Kairi thought she had earned some much needed rest and time with Sora.

But no, the Heartless had to go and kidnap her. Pricks. She was currently tied up and being carried coffin style by an army of cream-coloured Solders. Sora and Riku had been on their tail but a whole bunch of other Heartless had attacked them, holding them back. So now she was alone with only the Solders and her thoughts for company, and they weren’t conversationists. While she could summon her Keyblade to try and get free, she was bound so tightly it hurt to move. And unluckily for Kairi, her chances of escape were about to get worse, as a Corridor of Darkness appeared and the Solders marched with her right through it. Kairi was lucky that being a Princess of Heart made her immune to corruption by Darkness, but she didn’t know where she would end up.

After a bit of marching in the black and purple liquid tunnel, the kidnapping party emerged from the other side into a.....
113.title: Kidnapping a Princess of Heart

She looked down and stared at herself; she couldn't have gained more than 10 or 20 pounds. Sure, her tank top was a lot tighter and her pants were starting to bust; it wasn't like she was THAT fat. Olette walked calmly into the changing room and, stripping to her bra and underwear, surveyed herself in the full-body mirror.

Noticing her own face first, Olette's cheeks had bloated and a third chin was forming. Her belly had expanded a bit as well, but was nothing compared to her breasts. They had definitely take up the most flab; each one had at least grown 3 cupsizes, and as Olette removed her much-too-small bra, they even seemed to grow when they were no longer compressed.

Her waistline had expanded a lot too, and her ass was fatter as well; removing her underwear, she noticed how much starin it had been putting on her before. Each of her thighs was about half as large as the old her.

"Deny me service?!" Olette bellowed, "Haven't you seen that I'm starving?! Of course I exceed 200 pounds, that's what each of my ass cheeks probably weigh alone! Now I'm demanding that you get me a table before I have to sit on you, DO YOU HEAR ME?!"

Without even sitting down, Olette ran- rather, jiggled- to the bar, shoving everything she could fit onto her plate. Within thirty seconds, the huge plate was covered with food, and Olette, in her hunger, had taken one of the spoons that is supposed to be left at the buffet table and taken a spoonful of whipped cream.

She could barely fit into the booth. As her huge ass hit the bench, she was already eating with gusto, occasionally having to stop to blow her long hair from her face. 1343312.content:
Fitting their rather large bodies through the door of a shop called Big Sweets, Olette and Eva were hungrier than ever. The chef behind the counter greeted them with a hearty smile, shouting to Eva, "Back to make the deal?"

"What?" Olette asked as Eva pulled her to the side.

"The guy told me that if I would stand outside the shop and advertise, he'd let me come in and have all the sweets that I can eat. Since you're my guest, you're included too. So ask him for anything you like, no charge."

Olette gazed at the long table of sweets. "Well, I guess I'll just have a piece of this cake here," she said meekly, taking a small bite.

"Come on," Eva encouraged her, "You don't need to be modest about eating around here. Eat as much as you want of whatever you want! It won't cost a thing!" To prove her point, Eva was holding what looked like half of a ckae, which she quickly shoved into her mouth.

"...Anything?"

"Anything, Olette. Eat."

Giving in to her hunger, Olette dove at the table and began to eat anything that she could get her hands on. Cakes, cupcakes, cookies, candies- everything disappeared down Olette's gullet and into her growing belly.

Not to be outdone, Eva was eating like a pro. She used her gigantic piggy hands to grab globs of food, all of which disappeared into her mouth. Any crumbs missed by her gaping maw fell into her rapidly growing cleavage and were lost.

Within minutes the table was empty and Olette discovered that she had an urgent need for the bathroom. She also discovered that she weighed about 500 pounds.

Using the restroom, she turned to the mirror to find a pure black version of herself staring back at her.

But however huge Olette was, her reflection was twice that. It let out a resonant cry of "Feed me!" and reached from the mirror, grabbing Olette and pulling her in.
